info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Text Analysis
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.0

post.description: Request text analysis over a collection of documents.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain request and document level statistics.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: Submit a collection of text documents for analysis. Specify one or more unique tasks to be executed as a long-running operation.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Operation-Location.description: The location for monitoring the operation state.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Get the status of an analysis job. A job can consist of one or more tasks. After all tasks succeed, the job transitions to the succeeded state and results are available for each task.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain request and document level statistics.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The maximum number of resources to return from the collection.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An offset into the collection of the first resource to be returned.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.summary: Cancel a long-running Text Analysis job.
post.description: Cancel a long-running Text Analysis job.

AbstractiveSummarizationLROResult.description: An object representing the results for an Abstractive Summarization task.

AbstractiveSummarizationLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for an Abstractive Summarization task.

parameters.description: Parameters for the Abstractive Summarization task.

AbstractiveSummarizationResult.description: An object representing the pre-built Abstractive Summarization results of each document.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

AbstractiveSummarizationTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for the pre-built Abstractive Summarization task.

sentenceCount.description: Controls the approximate number of sentences in the output summaries.

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

summaryLength.description: (NOTE: Recommended to use summaryLength over sentenceCount) Controls the approximate length of the output summaries.

instruction.description: (Optional) If provided, the query will be used to generate the summary.

AbstractiveSummary.description: An object representing a single summary with context for given document.

contexts.description: The context list of the summary.

AbstractiveSummaryDocumentResultWithDete.description: An object representing the Abstractive Summarization result of a single document with detected language.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

AgeMetadata.description: Represents the Age entity Metadata model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

AllowOverlapEntityPolicyType.description: Represents the allow overlap policy. Will apply no post processing logic for the entities. Whatever the model predicts is what will be returned to the user. This allows the user to get a full view of every single model's possible values and apply their own custom logic on entity selection

Conditionality.description: Describes any conditionality on the entity.

CurrencyMetadata.description: Represents the Currency ) entity Metadata model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

iso4217.description: The alphabetic code based on another ISO standard, ISO 3166, which lists the codes for country names. The first two letters of the ISO 4217 three-letter code are the same as the code for the country name, and, where possible, the third letter corresponds to the first letter of the currency name.

DateMetadata.description: A Metadata for date entity instances.

DateTimeMetadata.description: A Metadata for datetime entity instances.

timex.description: An extended ISO 8601 date/time representation as described in (https://github.com/Microsoft/Recognizers-Text/blob/master/Patterns/English/English-DateTime.yaml)

modifier.description: Modifier for datetime to indicate point of reference like before, after etc.

DetectedLanguage.description: Contains the details of the detected language for the text.

name.description: Long name of a detected language (e.g. English, French).

iso6391Name.description: A two letter representation of the detected language according to the ISO 639-1 standard (e.g. en, fr).

confidenceScore.description: A confidence score between 0 and 1. Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true.

scriptName.description: Identifies the script name of the input document according to the ISO 15924 standard.

scriptIso15924Code.description: Identifies the script code of the input document according to the ISO 15924 standard.

DocumentSentimentValue.description: Predicted sentiment for document (Negative, Neutral, Positive, or Mixed).

DocumentStatistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the document.

DocumentWarning.description: Contains the warnings object with warnings encountered for the processed document.

targetRef.description: A JSON pointer reference indicating the target object.

EntitiesTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for an Entity Recognition task.

stringIndexType.description: (Optional) parameter to provide the string index type used to interpret string offsets. Defaults to TextElements (Graphemes).

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

inclusionList.description: (Optional) request parameter that limits the output to the requested entity types included in this list. We will apply inclusionList before exclusionList

exclusionList.description: (Optional) request parameter that filters out any entities that are included the excludeList. When a user specifies an excludeList, they cannot get a prediction returned with an entity in that list. We will apply inclusionList before exclusionList

overlapPolicy.description: (Optional) describes the type of overlap policy to apply to the ner output.

inferenceOptions.description: (Optional) request parameter that allows the user to provide settings for running the inference.

EntitiesWithMetadataAutoResult.description: Contains the entity recognition task result.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

Entity.description: Defines the detected entity object containing the entity category and entity text detected, etc.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

EntityCategory.description: Contains all the entity categories detected by entity recognition.

values.name: Address
values.description: Specific street-level mentions of locations: house/building numbers, streets, avenues, highways, intersections referenced by name.

values.name: Numeric
values.description: Numeric values, including digits and number words.

values.name: Information
values.description: Unit of measure for digital information.

values.name: Event
values.description: Social, sports, business, political, educational, natural, historical, criminal, violent, legal, military events with a timed period.

values.name: Location
values.description: Particular point or place in physical space.

values.name: Geological
values.description: Geographic and natural features such as rivers, oceans, and deserts.

values.name: Organization
values.description: Corporations, agencies, and other groups of people defined by some established organizational structure. These labels can include companies, political parties/movements, musical bands, sport clubs, government bodies, and public organizations. Nationalities or religions are not ORGANIZATION.

values.name: Person
values.description: First, last, and middle names, names of fictional characters, and aliases. Titles, such as 'Mr.' or 'President', are not considered part of the named entity.

values.name: PersonType
values.description: Human roles classified by a group membership.

values.name: PhoneNumber
values.description: Phone numbers (US and EU phone numbers only).

values.name: Product
values.description: Single or group of commercial, consumable objects, electronics, vehicles, food groups.

EntityInferenceOptions.description: The class that houses the inference options allowed for named entity recognition.

excludeNormalizedValues.description: Option to include/exclude the detected entity values to be normalized and included in the metadata. The numeric and temporal entity types support value normalization.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

entities.description: Recognized well known entities in the document.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

EntityMaskPolicyType.description: Represents the policy of redacting PII with the entity type.

EntityRecognitionLROResult.description: Contains the entity recognition job task result.

EntitySynonym.description: The entity synonyms used to enhance pii entity detection

synonym.description: The synonym to be used for context

language.description: The 2 letter ISO 639-1 language the synonym

EntitySynonyms.description: Object that allows the user to provide synonyms for context words that to enhance pii entity detection.

EntityTag.description: Entity tag object which contains the name of the tags abd any associated confidence score. Entity Tags are used to express some similarities/affinity between entities.

name.description: Name of the tag. Entity Tag names will be unique globally.

confidenceScore.description: Detection score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

EntityWithMetadata.description: Entity object with tags and metadata.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

type.description: An entity type is the lowest (or finest) granularity at which the entity has been detected. The type maps to the specific metadata attributes associated with the entity detected.

tags.description: List of entity tags. Tags are to express some similarities/affinity between entities.

Error.description: The error response object returned when the service encounters some errors during processing the request.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

values.name: AzureCognitiveSearchNotFound
values.description: Azure Cognitive Search not found error

values.name: AzureCognitiveSearchIndexNotFound
values.description: Azure Cognitive Search index not found error

values.name: AzureCognitiveSearchIndexLimitReached
values.description: Azure Cognitive Search index limit reached error

ExtractedSummaryDocumentResultWithDetect.description: A ranked list of sentences representing the extracted summary.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

sentences.description: Specifies the the extracted sentences from the input document.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

ExtractedSummarySentence.description: Represents an extracted sentences from the input document.

rankScore.description: A double value representing the relevance of the sentence within the summary. Higher values indicate higher importance.

offset.description: The sentence offset from the start of the document, based on the value of the parameter StringIndexType.

sentenceCount.description: Specifies the number of sentences in the extracted summary.

sortBy.description: Specifies how to sort the extracted summaries.

values.name: Offset
values.description: Indicates that results should be sorted in order of appearance in the text.

values.name: Rank
values.description: Indicates that results should be sorted in order of importance (i.e. rank score) according to the model.

stringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

query.description: (Optional) If provided, the query will be used to extract most relevant sentences from the document.

FhirBundle.description: JSON bundle containing a FHIR compatible object for consumption in other Healthcare tools. For additional information see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/overview.html.

conditionality.description: Describes any conditionality on the entity.

certainty.description: Describes the entities certainty and polarity.

association.description: Describes if the entity is the subject of the text or if it describes someone else.

temporality.description: Describes temporal information regarding the entity.

HealthcareEntitiesDocumentResultWithDocu.description: Result object for the processed Healthcare document with detected language.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

fhirBundle.description: JSON bundle containing a FHIR compatible object for consumption in other Healthcare tools. For additional information see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/overview.html.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

HealthcareEntity.description: Healthcare entity extracted from the document

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

name.description: Preferred name for the entity. Example: 'histologically' would have a 'name' of 'histologic'.

links.description: Entity references in known data sources.

HealthcareEntityLink.description: Reference to an entity in known data sources.

dataSource.description: Entity Catalog. Examples include: UMLS, CHV, MSH, etc.

id.description: Entity id in the given source catalog.

HealthcareLROResult.description: Healthcare Analyze Text long tunning operation result object.

HealthcareLROTask.description: The long running task to be performed by the service on the Healthcare input documents.

HealthcareRelation.description: Every relation is an entity graph of a certain relationType, where all entities are connected and have specific roles within the relation context.

relationType.description: Type of relation. Examples include: `DosageOfMedication` or 'FrequencyOfMedication', etc.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted relation.

ref.description: Reference link object, using a JSON pointer RFC 6901 (URI Fragment Identifier Representation), pointing to the entity .

role.description: Role of entity in the relationship. For example: 'CD20-positive diffuse large B-cell lymphoma' has the following entities with their roles in parenthesis:  CD20 (GeneOrProtein), Positive (Expression), diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (Diagnosis).

HealthcareResult.description: Result object for the processed Healthcare task.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

documents.description: List of result objects for the processed Healthcare documents.

values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

fhirVersion.description: The FHIR Spec version that the result will use to format the fhirBundle. For additional information see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/overview.html.

documentType.description: Document type that can be provided as input for Fhir Documents. Expect to have fhirVersion provided when used. Behavior of using None enum is the same as not using the documentType parameter.

id.description: Unique identifier of the recognized entity from the data source.

url.description: URL for the entity's page from the data source.

dataSource.description: Data source used to extract entity linking, such as Wiki/Bing etc.

bingId.description: Bing Entity Search API unique identifier of the recognized entity.

Match.description: The Match object containing the detected entity text with the offset and the length.

confidenceScore.description: If a well known item is recognized, a decimal number denoting the confidence level between 0 and 1 will be returned.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity match text.

length.description: Length for the entity match text.

MatchLongestEntityPolicyType.description: Represents the Match longest overlap policy. No overlapping entities as far as it is possible. 1. If there are overlapping entities, the longest one will be returned. 2. If the set of characters predicted for 2 or more entities are exactly the same, select the entity that has the higher confidence score.3. If the entity scores are identical, return all entities that are still present after applying the previous rules. 3. If there is partial overlap (as in Hello Text Analytics) follow the above steps starting from 1.

values.name: DateTimeMetadata
values.description: Metadata for date and time-related values.

values.name: TemporalSetMetadata
values.description: Metadata for set of time-related values.

MultiLanguageAnalysisInput.description: Collection of input documents to be analyzed by the service.

documents.description: The input documents to be analyzed.

MultiLanguageInput.description: Contains an input document to be analyzed by the service.

language.description: (Optional) This is the 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of a language. For example, use \"en\" for English; \"es\" for Spanish etc. If not set, use \"en\" for English as default. (Following only applies to 2023-04-15-preview and above) For Auto Language Detection, use \"auto\". If not set, use \"en\" for English as default.

NoMaskPolicyType.description: Represents the policy of not redacting found PII.

NumberKind.description: The type of the extracted number entity.

NumberMetadata.description: A metadata for numeric entity instances.

value.description: A numeric representation of what the extracted text denotes.

NumericRangeMetadata.description: represents the Metadata of numeric intervals.

rangeKind.description: Kind of numeric ranges supported - like Number, Speed, etc.

minimum.description: The beginning value of  the interval.

maximum.description: The ending value of the interval.

OrdinalMetadata.description: A metadata for numeric entity instances.

offset.description: The offset with respect to the reference (e.g., offset = -1 indicates the second to last)

relativeTo.description: The reference point that the ordinal number denotes.

value.description: A simple arithmetic expression that the ordinal denotes.

PiiCategoriesExclude.description: (Optional) describes the PII categories to return

values.name: Default
values.description: Default PII categories for the language.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

type.description: An entity type is the lowest (or finest) granularity at which the entity has been detected. The type maps to the specific metadata attributes associated with the entity detected.

tags.description: List of entity tags. Tags are to express some similarities/affinity between entities.

mask.description: Optional field which will be returned only when using the redaction policy kind MaskWithEntityType.  This field will contain the exact mask text used to mask the PII entity in the original text

maskOffset.description: Start position of masked text in the redacted text when using the redaction policy kind MaskWithEntityType.

maskLength.description: The length of the masked text. Will be present when using the redaction policy kind MaskWithEntityType.

PiiLROTask.description: Contains the analyze text PIIEntityRecognition LRO task.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

PiiResultWithDetectedLanguage.description: Contains the PII results with detected language.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

PiiTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a PII Entities Recognition task.

values.name: phi
values.description: Indicates that entities in the Personal Health Information domain should be redacted.

values.name: none
values.description: Indicates that no domain is specified.

piiCategories.description: Enumeration of PII categories to be returned in the response.

stringIndexType.description: StringIndexType to be used for analysis.

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

excludePiiCategories.description: Enumeration of PII categories to be excluded in the response.

redactionPolicy.description: RedactionPolicy to be used on the input.

valueExclusionPolicy.description: Policy for specific words and terms that should be excluded from detection by the PII detection service

entitySynonyms.description: (Optional) request parameter that allows the user to provide synonyms for context words that to enhance pii entity detection.

PiiTaskResult.description: Contains the analyze text PIIEntityRecognition LRO task.

RangeInclusivity.description: The range inclusiveness of this property property.

RangeKind.description: The kind of the number range entity.

RelativeTo.description: The reference point that the ordinal number denotes.

RequestStatistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

documentsCount.description: Number of documents submitted in the request.

validDocumentsCount.description: Number of valid documents. This excludes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

erroneousDocumentsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the request.

SentenceAssessment.description: Represents a sentence assessment and the assessments or target objects related to it.

confidenceScores.description: Represents the confidence scores across all sentiment classes: positive and negative.

offset.description: The target offset from the start of the sentence.

isNegated.description: The indicator representing if the assessment is negated.

sentiment.description: The predicted Sentiment for the sentence.

confidenceScores.description: The sentiment confidence score between 0 and 1 for the sentence for all classes.

offset.description: The target offset from the start of the sentence.

targets.description: The array of sentence targets for the sentence.

assessments.description: The array of assessments for the sentence.

SentenceSentimentValue.description: The predicted Sentiment for the sentence.

SentenceTarget.description: Represents a sentence target and the assessments or target objects related to it.

confidenceScores.description: Represents the confidence scores across all sentiment classes: positive and negative.

offset.description: The target offset from the start of the sentence.

relations.description: The array of either assessment or target objects which is related to the target.

SentimentAnalysisLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for a Sentiment Analysis task.

parameters.description: Parameters for the Sentiment Analysis task.

SentimentAnalysisTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Sentiment Analysis task.

opinionMining.description: Whether to use opinion mining in the request or not.

stringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

SentimentConfidenceScores.description: Represents the confidence scores between 0 and 1 across all sentiment classes: positive, neutral, negative.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

sentiment.description: Predicted sentiment for document (Negative, Neutral, Positive, or Mixed).

confidenceScores.description: The sentiment confidence score between 0 and 1 for the sentence for all classes.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

SentimentLROResult.description: Contains the Sentiment Analysis LRO results.

SentimentResponse.description: Sentiment analysis results for the input documents.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

documents.description: The sentiment analysis results for each document in the input.

SentimentTaskResult.description: Contains the analyze text SentimentAnalysis LRO task result.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

values.name: YardsPerMinute

values.name: YardsPerSecond
values.description: Speed unit in yards per second.

values.name: CentimetersPerMillisecond
values.description: Speed unit in centimeters per millisecond.

values.name: KilometersPerMillisecond

State.description: The status of the task at the mentioned last update time.

offset.description: Start position for the context. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: The length of the context. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

SummaryLengthBucket.description: Enum that defines the length of the output summaries.

values.name: short
values.description: Instructs model to generate shorter length summaries.

values.name: medium
values.description: Instructs model to generate medium length summaries.

values.name: long
values.description: Instructs model to generate longer length summaries.

TargetConfidenceScoreLabel.description: Represents the confidence scores across all sentiment classes: positive and negative.

TargetRelation.description: Represents the relation between assessments and/or targets.

ref.description: The JSON pointer indicating the linked object.

relationType.description: The type related to the target.

TargetRelationType.description: The type related to the target.

Tasks.description: Container for the tasks status for the LRO job.

items.description: Enumerable of Analyze text job results.

TemperatureMetadata.description: Represents the Information entity Metadata model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

TemporalModifier.description: An optional modifier of a date/time instance.

values.name: SinceEnd

values.name: AfterMid
values.description: After the middle of a time period

values.name: End

values.name: AfterStart
values.description: After the start of a time period

values.name: Mid

TemporalSetMetadata.description: A Metadata for temporal set entity instances.

TemporalSpanMetadata.description: represents the Metadata of a date and/or time span.

duration.description: An optional duration value formatted based on the ISO 8601 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)

modifier.description: Modifier for datetime to indicate point of reference like before, after etc.

timex.description: An optional triplet containing the beginning, the end, and the duration all stated as ISO 8601 formatted strings.

Temporality.description: Describes temporal information regarding the entity.

TimeMetadata.description: A Metadata for time entity instances.

TokenSentimentValue.description: The predicted Sentiment for the sentence.

caseSensitive.description: Option to make the values excluded values case sensitive

excludedValues.description: List of words and terms that should be excluded from detection by the PII detection service

WarningCodeValue.description: Defines the list of the warning codes.

WeightMetadata.description: Represents the Weight ) entity Metadata model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

relationType.description: Type of relation. Examples include: `DosageOfMedication` or 'FrequencyOfMedication', etc.
